full_text: a oo aes 2019/KER/1010 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY, THE 09TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 174 of 2019 SC 1357/2013 OF SPECIAL COURT FOR TRIAL OF CBI CASES, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM PETITIONER/S: ABDUL RASHEED .N AGED 54 YEARS S/O.M NOOHU KANNU, VARIKOLIL VADAKKATHIL, VENGARA, THODIYOOR NORTH.P.O., KARUNAGAPPALLY, KOLLAM DISTRICT, KERALA. BY ADVS. SRI.S.RAJEEV SRI .D.FEROZE SRI .K.K.DHEERENDRAKRISHNAN SRI .V.VINAY RESPONDENT/S: CENTRAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, (REPRESENTED BY STANDING COUNSEL) S.P-CBI-SCB THIRUVANANTHAPURAM-695001. (CRIME NO.RC 1(S) /2012/CBI/SCB/CHENNAL. OTHER PRESENT: SRI C S HRITHWIK-SR PP 2019/KER/1010 Crl.MC.No. 174 of 2019 1i2.. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioner is one of the accused in SC No. 1357 of 2013 on the file of the Special Court for the Trial of CBI Cases, Thiruvananthapuram. He has filed Annexure-IV application under Section 227 Cr.P.C. for his discharge. The only request in this Crl.M.C. is to direct the trial court to dispose it of expeditiously. 3. After hearing both sides, I am satisfied that the request is reasonable. 4. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of directing the trial court to dispose of Annexure-IV application as expeditiously as possible. The learned Sessions Judge shall only look into the materials relied on by the ci Roe Be 2019/KER/1010 Crl.MC.No. 174 of 2019 1.3.. investigating officer in support of the final report. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE I TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION SUBMITTED BY CBI WHICH IS TAKEN ON THE FILE AS CRL.M.C.NO.1554/2016. ANNEXURE II TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER DATED 27.6.2017 IN CRL.M.C.1554/2016 PASSED BY THIS HON'BLE COURT. ANNEXURE III TRUE COPY OF THE OBJECTION FILED BY CBI BEFORE THE COURT OF SESSIONS, ERNAKULAM, IN CRL.MC.NO.279/2015. ANNEXURE IV TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION SUBMITTED BY THE PETITIONER BEFORE THE SPECIAL COURT CBI THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. BKA/10.01.2019
